basnahira palath ragar sangaya meheyawana wayasa awurudu 18 n pahala pasal lig ragar tharagawaliye awasan purwa tharaga ada(13) kolambaa hawlok pitiyedi pawathwe.‘kap’ anshaye mema awasan purwa watayedi widya widuhal pila tharstan widuhal pila samagath, aananda widuhal kandayama lalith athulathmudali widuhal kandayama samagath tharaga wadinu atha.‘kap’ anshaye ardha awasan purwa watayedi widya widuhala lakunu 57- 0 kin dharmapala widuhala parajaya kala athara tharstan ha di.es.senanayaka widuhal athara pawathwimata niyamithawa thibu tharagayedi kridakayan pramanawath wa nositima matha di.es.senanayaka widuhal pila tharstan pilata nitharanga jayak laba dunne ya.anek ardha awasan purwa tharagawaladi lalith athulathmudali widuhal pila lakunu 7 - 5 kin si.dabliw.dabliw kannangara widuhala parajaya kala athara aananda widuhala lakunu 32 - 0 kin lumbini widuhala parajaya kale ya..

paramparika karmanthakaruwan sadaha awashya amudrawya sapaya ganimedi siduwana apahasutha magaharawa ganimata awashya piyawara rasak ganimata madhyama palath karmantha amathyanshayen katayuthu sampadanaya kara athi bawa ema palath krida yauwana katayuthu wanitha gramasanwardhana ha karmantha amathi pramitha bandara thennakon mahatha pawasiya.karmanthakaruwan me sambandhawa awastha kihipayakadi kala danumdima matha pama sthanayan wetha gos parikshakara pawalema awashya piyawara washayen sesathkaruwanta awashya miniran laba ganimata piyawara ganna ladi.me miniran laba ganimedi warthamanaye milata wada aduwen laba gatha haki bawath miniran kilo pakak rupiyal wissakata labagatha haki bawath palath amathiwaraya pawasiya.karmantha karuwan sitinne mathale disthrikkaye unaweruwa game bawin owunata wadi salakillak dakwima sadaha miniran balapathrayak da lagadima labadena bawath madhyama palath krida yauwana katayuthu wanitha gramasanwardhana ha karmantha amathya pramitha bandara thennakon mahatha pawasiya.
